attributes.action: Revise the music licensing laws with regard to UK radio stations being allowed to broadcast internationally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please allow UK radio stations unrestricted access to broadcast their radio shows internationally on the internet.

This would help all British citizens, both ex pats and those working out of the UK with internet access, in day to day living, simply by being able to keep a link with home.
